alert.note: Alert for Borden; Scurry (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 7:39PM CDT until May 23 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN SCURRY AND NORTHEASTERN BORDEN COUNTIES... At 738 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fluvanna, or 12 miles southwest of Lake Alan Henry, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...The Fluvanna mesonet reported a 61 mph wind gust at 728 PM CDT. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Snyder, Fluvanna, Winston Field and Randalls Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
